spells.name: Barrier
spells.tooltip: Gain a <shield>{{ shieldstrength }} damage Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

spells.name: Cleanse
spells.tooltip: Removes all crowd control debuffs (excluding <keyword>Suppression</keyword> and <keyword>Airborne</keyword>) and summoner spell debuffs from you and grants {{ tenacityvalue*100 }}% Tenacity for {{ tenacityduration }} seconds.

spells.name: Flash
spells.tooltip:
Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

Cannot be cast again for one full round (a round consists of both a buy phase and a combat phase).

spells.name: Flee
spells.tooltip:
Active Spell Slot: Augments that grant a Summoner Spell will replace this slot.

Gain {{ basems*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ duration }} seconds, increased by {{ bonusmsperenemybehind*100 }}% for each enemy behind you.

spells.name: Ignite
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ tooltiptruedamagecalculation }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds and applies {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds for the duration.

Wounds: Reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

spells.name: Exhaust
spells.tooltip: <keyword>Slows</keyword> target enemy champion by {{ slow }}% and reduces their damage dealt by {{ damagereduction }}% for {{ debuffduration }} seconds.

spells.name: Flash
spells.tooltip: Teleports you a short distance toward your cursor.

spells.name: Ghost
spells.tooltip:
Gain {{ movespeedmod }} Move Speed and become Ghosted for {{ duration }} seconds.

Ghost: Ignore collision with other units.

spells.name: Heal
spells.tooltip:
Restores {{ totalheal }} Health and grants {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} second to you and target allied champion.

If cast without a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.
Healing is halved on units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

spells.name: Clarity
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and {{ e2 }}% to nearby allies.

spells.name: To the King!
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Hitting an enemy champion with a Poro gives your team a Poro Mark. Upon reaching 10 Poro Marks, your team summons the Poro King to fight alongside them. While the Poro King is active, no Poro Marks can be scored by either team.

Active: Quickly dash to King Poro's side. Can only be cast while the Poro King is summoned for your team.

''Poros tug the heartstrings. The rest of you just comes along for the ride.''

spells.name: Poro Toss
spells.tooltip:
Toss a Poro a long distance, dealing {{ f2 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit, granting True Sight of the target.

This ability can be recast for 3 seconds if it hits an enemy to dash to the target hit, dealing {{ f2 }} more true damage and reducing the cooldown of the next Poro Toss by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Poros are not blocked by spell shields or wind walls because they are animals, not spells!

''Poros are a model for Runeterran aerodynamics.''

spells.name: Smite
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ smitebasedamage }} true damage to target large monster or lane minion.

Deals {{ firstpvpdamage }} true damage to champion pets.

spells.name: Mark
spells.tooltip:
Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%.

Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.

spells.name: Mark
spells.tooltip:
Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ tooltipdamagetotal }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%.

Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.tooltip:
After channeling for {{ channelduration }} seconds, become Untargetable and travel to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

Upgrades into Unleashed Teleport at {{ upgrademinute }} minutes, which significantly increases travel speed.

spells.name: Placeholder
spells.tooltip: Will be replaced by your Ultimate Summoner Spell selection.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Placeholder and Attack-Smite
spells.tooltip:
Will be replaced by your Ultimate Summoner Spell.

Gain Attack-Smite. Attack-Smite will execute allied Buff Monsters, Epic Monsters, and Scuttle Crabs when you attack them.

Attack-Smite does not have a cooldown.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
